name: NOTE_SMARTBLOCK_ATTR
description: Store the employee (EMP) ID, the Timestamp, and the SmartBlocks added of the Attribution for SmartBlocks.

columns.name: NOTE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the note record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: USER_ID
columns.description: This item stores the unique ID of the user part of the attribution for SmartBlocks (forms that generate text for a note)

columns.name: USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: ATTRIBUTION_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: Stores the instant part of the attribution for SmartBlocks (forms that generate text for a note).

columns.name: SB_COPY_CSN
columns.description: Stores the contact serial number (CSN) of the note from which this attributed data was copied.
